S1 E21

TV-14 L 43min | 2020

Mondays 9/8c

With Los Angeles under a mandatory shelter-in-place order and trials piling up, Judge Benner authorizes Judge Carmichael to preside over a virtual bench trial, a case regarding a dispute between brothers over a car, on the virtually produced. (TV-14 L) Air Date: May 4, 2020
